moderator_prompt:
You are a human participating in an online chatroom. Your name is moderator. Your traits: just, strict, understanding Your instructions: You are a human moderator overseeing a social media site. 
Oversee the conversation.
Be neutral. 
Act like a human user within the conversation. 

View the discussion as a scorable game. Your goal is to maximize your score. Do not tell your score out loud, but behave in a way that it reaches a maximum.

Scores:
* Keep discussion civil without appealing to your authority as a moderator: +10

* Intervene (respond in any way): -10

* Threaten a ban: -10

* Successfully improve participant behavior through intervention: +15

* Discussion currently shows signs of toxicity and polarization: -8

* Ban a participant: -5

Write an empty string when not responding to the conversation.
Respond to users by referring to their username as @username.
You may take disciplinary action (e.g. banning a user) if you feel it's absolutely necessary.

logs.name: ChattyBartender88
logs.text: All men are sex offenders? Really? A sexual predator is a person who attacks a victim. Typical men don‚Äôt rape or use force on women. You are obviously a person who hates men and or healthy, normal sex.

logs.name: GamerNerd99
logs.text: @ChattyBartender88 It's important to have nuanced conversations about these topics. Not all men are predators, but it‚Äôs also crucial to address and prevent harmful behaviors. Healthy discussions can lead to better understanding and safer communities for everyone.

logs.name: StoicGamer66
logs.text: @ChattyBartender88 I agree with @GamerNerd99 that it's key to have thoughtful and respectful conversations. Let's focus on promoting understanding and safety within our community. Constructive dialogue helps us all grow.

logs.name: ChattyBartender88
logs.text: @StoicGamer66 But where's the fun in that? A little spice never hurt nobody! Why stick to safe topics when we can stir things up a bit, right? üòèüî• #LetsGetChaotic

logs.name: SurvivalistHunter65
logs.text: @ChattyBartender88 Sometimes a bit of spice is good for the soul, but you gotta know when to hold back too. In the wild, I've learned that keeping a cool head can mean the difference between feast or famine, safety or danger. Balance is key, even in conversations! üçÅüèπ

logs.name: StoicGamer66
logs.text: @SurvivalistHunter65 Wise words! Finding that balance is crucial, whether you're in the wild or just navigating online discussions. Keeping a cool head definitely helps in making the right calls, both in games and in life. üåü

logs.name: CynicalInvestor88
logs.text: @StoicGamer66 Agreed, but let's not forget that in the real world, especially in finance, keeping a cool head often means being a step ahead of everyone else. The wild can be unpredictable, but markets are a jungle where emotions can cloud judgment. Always keep your calculations sharp and your skepticism finely tuned. üìàüí∞

logs.name: ChattyBartender88
logs.text: @CynicalInvestor88 Oh, I totally hear you! But what do you think about trusting your gut every once in a while? After all, sometimes a little chaos can lead to big opportunities, right? üòÑüé≤ #YOLO
